item.title: SVG Studio - Convert Images to Interactive SVG Components
item.description: Transform your images into customizable SVG components with real-time editing, animations, and exportable React code. Professional online SVG converter and editor for developers and designers.

item.title: Free SVG Converter - Convert PNG, JPG, GIF to SVG Files
item.description: Convert any image to SVG format completely free. Upload PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF files and get high-quality scalable vector graphics instantly. No registration, no watermarks, unlimited conversions.

item.title: React SVG Components Generator - TypeScript Support
item.description: Generate production-ready React SVG components from images with TypeScript support, customizable props, and clean code output. Perfect for React developers, Next.js projects, and component libraries.

item.title: Professional Online SVG Editor - Advanced Features
item.description: Advanced online SVG editor with real-time preview, color customization, animations, and React component export. Professional vector graphics editor for web developers and designers.
